title: Yuichiro Anzai Named Chief Executive Officer | News | The Tokyo Foundation

quotes: On December 1, 2020, the Tokyo Foundation for Policy Research appointed Executive Director Yuichiro Anzai to serve concurrently as Chief Executive Officer.
